Events.PreEventString: There's a golden chest on a nearby peak.
Events.PostEventString: Whith a lot of effort, you manage to climb and retrieve the treasure.

Events.PreEventString: A strong challenger approaches! $1 attacks you.
Events.PostEventString: You feel both of you have grown stronger today. The Pokemon gives you it's prized $1.

Events.PreEventString: You reach a remote temple. There's a glowing gem in the center: YE WHO SEEK AWAKENING, LET US BEGIN.

Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered some health.
Your mind is clear and your Pokemon have grown healthier. They are unburdened from their status conditions.

Events.PreEventString: A $1 looks you in the eye. It wants to become stronger, no matter the cost.
Events.PostEventString: It will join you and prove itself.

Events.PreEventString: There's a golden chest on a nearby peak.
Events.PostEventString: Unfortunately, you don't make it. You fall and injure yourself and your Pokemon.
The water was freezing! Bad idea! One of your Pokemon now has frostbite.

Events.PreEventString: These sacred grounds are not only meant for Pokemon. Trainers also need to get stronger. $1 is ready to battle you. Your pokemon are fully healed before the battle.
Events.PostEventString: You feel both of you have grown stronger today.

Events.PreEventString: A member of the Pokemon Research Society is also training.
Events.PostEventString: She's trying to study the sacred texts, looking for the secrets of life and death. She also gives you a $1, it's useless to her.

Events.PreEventString: On a dark corner, you see a Team Paradox grunt, holding a $1.
Events.PostEventString: He tells you: ''Why train? Just get Move Disks!''. Gives you a free one, on the house.

Floors.ShortcutClue: Before you is a massive bell. A sign says: 'Those with the strength to make the bell sound will find the way forward'.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: As the sound of $1 echoes through the mountains, a magical passage opens up.

Floors.ShortcutClue: Before you is the white face of a cliff. The summit is ahead, you may be able to climb the rocks, if you're brave enough.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 has defeated the mighty mountain. You're almost at the summit.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You can't believe what you see. In the distance, there's a castle, floating high on the clouds.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: You used $1 into the unknown, towards a place few have even seen.

BossEvent.PreEventString: Nothing left to be said. Time to show $1 how much you've progressed.
BossEvent.PostEventString: You have passed your trial. Take this $1, you've earned it.

CampingEvent.PreEventString: Proper recovery and rest are just as important as training itself. It's time to take a small break.
CampingEvent.PostEventString: But now it's time to move on...
